entry.title: Combined summary - Ensuring security of funds and preserving anonymity when using Bitcoin for e-commerce
entry.summary: Jonathan Patrick's blog post titled "Ensuring security of funds and preserving anonymity when using Bitcoin for e-commerce" emphasizes the importance of maintaining security and anonymity while using Bitcoin for e-commerce. The post provides detailed information on how to ensure the security of your Bitcoin wallet, including using multi-signature wallets and cold storage. Patrick also explains how to preserve anonymity by using multiple wallets and avoiding traceable transactions. He suggests using Tor or a VPN to increase privacy. The objective of the post is to educate readers on safely and securely using Bitcoin for e-commerce. The blog post can be found at http://jonathanpatrick.me/blog/bitcoin-ecommerce and is recommended for those seeking guidance on using Bitcoin for e-commerce while maintaining security and anonymity.
